unnormalised: Fasal bima do, bahay, abuk' khetihar kolegi bahu joruri kan!
normalised: Fasal bima do, dada, âbû châsîkô lâgit marang kâmî kânâ!

unnormalised: PMFBY-ren paisa emok' do arho Bihar re dinjom kan men'te ajom akada.
normalised: Âñjôm âkânâ je P M F B Y renâk pôysa do Bihar re âûrî dhâra te ge holongoh kânâ.

unnormalised: Hahali serma do Patna aṛe re ban' leka mit' ekor re bis hajar taka-ren hani hoelena.
normalised: Patna lâttâr re hârêl châsâr do môhân dâk te ek âkôr re kûlî hâjâr tâkâ nôkôsân hõy lenâ.

unnormalised: Nate do bes' bima paisa emok' asa kanang, khaskar' Onam hijuk' kan khan.
normalised: Inâ dhâra re dô bes bima hohôj renâk âsâ dôhõy kânâ, khâs kârôn Onam hijûk kân khân.

unnormalised: Bes' jonom sahãte, ar kichu biryani sahãte khusi doho darkar'!
normalised: Bes châs âr khêchi biryani te manaok kâmî kânâ!
Nañtê dô mudâñg re ge dhâkâr.

unnormalised: Mausam do Mumbai ren local train leka ban' bujhau dareak' kan.
normalised: Hôyôk do Mumbai renâk local train leka ge kôyôr bâñg tâhânâ.
